statusHistory.reason: Crew is actively operating in the Grand Line

description: A pirate crew led by the former king of Drum Kingdom, Wapol, comprised of loyalists who fled the island with him when the Blackbeard Pirates attacked. The crew operates from the Bliking, a submarine-capable ship.

formation.circumstances: Formed after Wapol fled Drum Kingdom following an attack by the Blackbeard Pirates, taking his most loyal subordinates with him.

keyMoments.title: Bliking Pirates Debut
keyMoments.description: The Bliking Pirates make their first appearance, emerging from underwater in their submarine ship and attacking the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Wapol's pirate crew and their unique submarine vessel.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Bliking Pirates are defeated when Luffy sends Wapol flying into the ocean, forcing Chess and Kuromarimo to retreat to rescue their captain.
keyMoments.significance: First defeat by the Straw Hats, establishing them as antagonists.

goals.description: Wapol seeks to reclaim his throne and kingdom after fleeing from the Blackbeard Pirates.

trivia.fact: The Bliking Pirates operate the first submarine ship shown in the One Piece series.
The crew is composed of former government officials from the Drum Kingdom who remained loyal to Wapol despite his tyranny.
